text: The Proposal is a romantic comedy movie from 2009. It is about a Canadian executive chief of staff working at a New York City book publishing company. She learns she will be deported due to an expired visa unless the visa matter is taken care of. Sandra Bullock plays the executive. Ryan Reynolds plays her assistant. This movie was released in June 2009. The reviews were mixed to negative. The Proposal took in over $317 million in the box office. It became the highest grossing romantic comedy in 2009. == Other websites == * Category:2009 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Alaska Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies directed by Anne Fletcher
title: The Proposal (movie)
